hints.title: Complete Convergence Fidelity
hints.content:
2158: :label: thm-complete-fidelity
2159: 
2160: The Fractal Set $\mathcal{F} = (\mathcal{N}, E_{\text{CST}} \cup E_{\text{IG}})$ is the path history of a **geometrically ergodic discrete-time Markov chain**. Specifically:
2161: 
2162: **1. Information:** {prf:ref}`thm-fractal-set-reconstruction` proves the Fractal Set contains complete SDE data (reconstruction).
2163: 
2164: **2. Dynamics:** {prf:ref}`thm-fractal-set-ergodicity` proves the generator is geometrically ergodic (convergence).
2165: 
2166: **3. Fidelity:** {prf:ref}`thm-weak-convergence-invariant` proves the discrete invariant measure approximates the continuous QSD.
2167: 
2168: **Combined:** The Fractal Set is a **faithful discrete representation** of the Adaptive Gas SDE, inheriting all convergence guarantees.
